import React, { Fragment, useContext } from "react"; import { useNavigate, useLocation } from "react-router-dom"; import "./style.css"; import { logout } from "./Action"; import { LayoutContext } from "../index"; import { isAdmin } from "../auth/fetchApi"; const Navber = () => { const navigate = useNavigate(); const location = useLocation(); const { data, dispatch } = useContext(LayoutContext); const navberToggleOpen = () => dispatch({ type: "hamburgerToggle", payload: !data.navberHamburger }); const loginModalOpen = () => dispatch({ type: "loginSignupModalToggle", payload: !data.loginSignupModal }); return (
navigate("/")} className="ml-2 font-bold uppercase text-gray-800 text-2xl cursor-pointer" > Hayroo
navigate("/")} className="hidden lg:block text-center text-gray-800 font-bold tracking-widest uppercase text-2xl cursor-pointer col-span-1" > Hayroo
{localStorage.getItem("jwt") ? (
    {isAdmin() ? ( <>
  • navigate("/admin/dashboard")} > Admin Panel
  • Logout
    • ) : ( <>
  • navigate("/user/orders")} > My Orders
  • navigate("/user/profile")} > My Account
  • navigate("/user/setting")} > Settings
  • Logout
    • )}
) : (
)}
{/* Mobile Links */} {data.navberHamburger && (
navigate("/")}> Shop navigate("/blog")}> Blog navigate("/contact-us")}> Contact us
)}
); }; export default Navber;
